rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC5650, ECC5660} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit provides students with the opportunities and skills to conduct, communicate, discuss, evaluate, and report research. Students find a supervisor in the Department of Economics and identify a preferred topic on which to conduct research after consulting with the supervisor. Students participate in a range of research activities and produce a final research paper.
